name: TheAtlantic
text: Prominent Trump critics worry about what may await them between now and Inauguration Day, @PeterAtlantic reports. Will the president try to retaliate against them? https://t.co/s7l5JDzc5E

name: TheAtlantic
text: “I find haiku hard / But for you, I will try it / Expectations: low.” For The Friendship Files, @julieebeck talks with two friends who’ve sent each other a haiku every day during the pandemic: https://t.co/DeyFtsIKWd

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Trump’s performative intransigence may or may not hurt American democracy in the long run, but in the short run, it risks thousands of excess COVID-19 deaths, with the potential toll increasing the longer his tantrum continues," @conor64 writes: https://t.co/8d3yLXwaGh

name: TheAtlantic
text: "I fear that in the short term, Americans will encounter less rigorous and more polarizing journalism. In the long term, a dearth of ideological diversity risks consequences we cannot fully anticipate," @conor64 writes: https://t.co/QrrxfLG46g

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Even with a vaccine that’s fully vetted and ready to go, it will take many months for enough people to receive it to provide population-wide protection," @DrTomFrieden writes: https://t.co/rBUacM4ApH

name: TheAtlantic
text: For the photographer Amber N. Ford, the death of 12-year-old Tamir Rice was a breaking point, @DrAlliRich writes. Ford pored over his story, and others like it, then mined her community for found art. https://t.co/LHH7Pq8nMS

name: TheAtlantic
text: The Atlantic Daily: @mimbsy asked writers and editors from around our newsroom to share a nostalgic TV pick. https://t.co/Mc4r3zAYUA

name: TheAtlantic
text: Every president since Ronald Reagan has left a note for his successor in the Oval Office. @alextkalman on the importance of this small moment for the life of a democracy: https://t.co/6IgI0LK3Em

name: TheAtlantic
text:
Listen: On the latest episode of "Social Distance," the lead principal investigator of the Pfizer vaccine explain the news that it’s 90 percent effective.
https://t.co/jlKWKJfpyM
